nodes.bodyText: Can this have a comment for folks like me that are not familiar with cron syntax?
nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -257,3 +277,14 @@ workflows:
           filters:
             branches:
               ignore: master
+
+  daily:
+    triggers:
+      - schedule:
+          cron: "0 5 * * *"

@@ -257,3 +277,14 @@ workflows:
           filters:
             branches:
               ignore: master
+
+  daily:
+    triggers:
+      - schedule:
+          cron: "0 5 * * *"

@@ -8,12 +8,23 @@ defaults: &defaults
 
 cache_keys: &cache_keys
   keys:
-    # Rev the version when the cache gets too big
+    # Rev the version when the cache gets too big, and don't forget to change the save_cache steps
+    # Dependent steps will find this cache
     - dd-trace-java-v1-{{ .Branch }}-{{ .Revision }}
-    - dd-trace-java-v1-{{ .Branch }}
+    # New branch commits will find this cache
+    - dd-trace-java-v1-{{ .Branch }}-{{ checksum "_circle_ci_cache_id" }}
+    # New branches fall back on main build caches
+    - dd-trace-java-v1-master-{{ checksum "_circle_ci_cache_base_id" }}
+
+save_cache_paths: &save_cache_paths
+  paths:
+    - ~/.gradle
+    - ~/.sbt
+    - ~/.cache/coursier

nodes.bodyText: As of sbt  1.4, coursier is the default dependency management tool, formerly ivy. I'll add a comment for each of the directories.
nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -8,12 +8,23 @@ defaults: &defaults
 
 cache_keys: &cache_keys
   keys:
-    # Rev the version when the cache gets too big
+    # Rev the version when the cache gets too big, and don't forget to change the save_cache steps
+    # Dependent steps will find this cache
     - dd-trace-java-v1-{{ .Branch }}-{{ .Revision }}
-    - dd-trace-java-v1-{{ .Branch }}
+    # New branch commits will find this cache
+    - dd-trace-java-v1-{{ .Branch }}-{{ checksum "_circle_ci_cache_id" }}
+    # New branches fall back on main build caches
+    - dd-trace-java-v1-master-{{ checksum "_circle_ci_cache_base_id" }}
+
+save_cache_paths: &save_cache_paths
+  paths:
+    - ~/.gradle
+    - ~/.sbt
+    - ~/.cache/coursier
